CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 10, 1957, pg. 14 reads: "Visiting Pittsburgh to take part in ABA tournament were some gorgeous gals and handsome men. Here, left to right, are Mrs. Hattie Besteda, Mobile, Ala.;...Mrs. Mayrell Helry, LaGrange, Ill."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Hattie Besteda, and Mayrell Helryt wearing floral off the shoulder dress, posed in Fort Pitt Hotel for 24th annual American Bridge Association tournament
